name: Regatta Storage
long_description: Regatta Storage is the new, default storage platform for cloud applications that helps data teams save 90% on their storage costs. Regatta transforms your existing S3 buckets into a local file system so that you can use your data with AI, analytics, genomics, and financial applications. Regatta accelerates data access, so your applications experience optimized, local-like performance. Regatta's storage scales with your applications, and you only pay for what you use -- no need to guess how much storage or performance you need. With no complex configuration, you can set up Regatta in a single click.
